title: Delium roll out four very competitively priced XC, Trail, Enduro and DH MTB Tires
content:
Indonesian tire manufacturer, Delium Tires, has released four new mountain bike tires covering XC, Trail, Enduro and Downhill, with prices starting at just $35 USD and topping out at $55 USD. The very affordable range offers three casing constructions and three compound layups, in 29″ and 27.5″ diameters, to deliver the right balance of grip,

The post Delium roll out four very competitively priced XC, Trail, Enduro and DH MTB Tires appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
